definition[0]: a type of food that a person, restaurant, or area is well known for
example[0]: The restaurant offers a wide variety of local specialities.
definition[1]: a subject or job that you know a lot about or have a lot of experience of
definition[2]: a subject or skill that you know a lot about or have a lot of experience of
example[3]: My speciality is international tax law.
definition[3]: speciality products are special or unusual in some way, and are therefore usually expensive
definition[4]: a shop or restaurant that sells unusual products or food that are special in some way
